subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which fort was built by Maharaja Jai Singh II?
question_hi: महाराजा जयसिंह श्री ई. ने किस क़मचंद्र बंदों में निवेश किया।
explanation_en: Maharaja Jai Singh II is known for constructing Amber Fort in Jaipur.
question_en: Which fort was built by Maharaja Jai Singh II?
